doc:
Mireille Perrier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mireille_Perrier 0 Mireille Perrier (born 14 November 1959) is a French actress. Her first starring role was in Leos Carax's Boy Meets Girl in 1983. Since then, Perrier has had major roles in other films such as Un monde sans pitié, Netchaïev est de retour, Toto le Héros, À vendre, Le Comptoir, Un dérangement considérable and L'entraînement du champion avant la course. In 1991, Perrier received a Joseph Plateau Award in the "Best Belgian Actress" category for her work in the Belgian film Toto le Héros. Mireille_Perrier ( born 14_November_1959 ) is a_French_actress . Her_first_starring_role was in Leos_Carax 's_Boy Meets Girl in 1983 . Since then , Perrier has_had major_roles in other_films such_as Un_monde_sans pitié , Netchaïev_est_de_retour , Toto le_Héros , À_vendre , Le_Comptoir , Un_dérangement_considérable_and_L'entraînement_du_champion_avant_la_course . In 1991 , Perrier received a_Joseph_Plateau_Award in the_"_Best_Belgian_Actress_"_category for her_work in the_Belgian_film_Toto le_Héros .
